strings.SS2_ITEM_ERRATICGADGET_PICKUP: Your lightning strikes deal double damage. Chance to fire chain lightning on hit.
strings.SS2_ITEM_ERRATICGADGET_DESC: Your lightning strikes deal <style=cIsDamage>2x</style> damage. <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> chance on hit to fire <style=cIsDamage>chain lightning</style> for <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> TOTAL damage on up to <style=cIsDamage>1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack)</style> targets.
